ghostPage.title: About
ghostPage.excerpt: We are Particl, a global and open collective of visionaries for a better world. We have joined our experienced multi-disciplinary forces to build towards our shared vision of a fair world with equal opportunities for all.

ghostPage.plaintext:
Particl is an ecosystem of privacy-first, pro-liberty decentralized applications
building against the centralization of power and services on the web.

United under the mission of shifting the balance of power from corporate
monopolies back to the people, the Particl team, a collective of cypherpunks
scattered across the world, has set out to design a decentralized digital
platform absent of any third-party involvement and a native privacy coin for
anonymous transactions between peers and within dApps.

These dApps offer a new take on the online services and products we all use
daily, providing the advantage of complete anonymity and eliminating the need
for third-party involvement.

? The genie is out of the bottle.

The Open-Source Revolution
Meeting today’s challenges requires an open-source and uncompromisingly
decentralized revolution. That’s why Particl’s code is entirely open and
available for all to inspect. Don’t trust, verify!

Check out the source code on Github and become a contributor!

Check out the code [https://github.com/particl]
